mapper.select: select nvl(stock_cnt, 0) stock_cnt from stock where upper(p_no) = upper(#{p_no})
mapper.update: update stock set stock_cnt = stock_cnt - #{stock_cnt} where p_no = #{p_no}
mapper.select: select product.p_no, stock_cnt, category.ca_name, p_type_cd.cc_name "p_type_name", p_name, p_price, p_discount, color_cd.cc_name "color", size_cd.cc_name "size", to_char(stock_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') stock_date from product left join category on product.ca_no = category.ca_no left join common_code size_cd on upper(product.size_code) = upper(size_cd.cc_no) left join common_code color_cd on upper(product.color_code) = upper(color_cd.cc_no) left join common_code p_type_cd on upper(product.p_type) = upper(p_type_cd.cc_no) left join stock on product.p_no = stock.p_no order by stock_cnt asc
mapper.update: update stock set stock_cnt = stock_cnt + #{stock_cnt}, stock_date = sysdate where p_no = #{p_no}
